channel.title: Friends LIST , Help Requested
channel.description: hey every1, how could i make it so in friends list, the logged in friends are at the top and the offline friends are under the logged in friends, ( if some1 logged of, he doesnt stay at the top of the friends list) and second thing, how to make it so when some1 logges in, says blablabla has logged in, and if logges out, it says blablabla has logged out, because on my server, when i log out, it says balablabla logged in, and when i log in, says blabla has logged in, in both times it says logged in ( i am talking about friend list )

item.title: Friends LIST , Help Requested
item.dc:creator: @baselm baselm
item.description:
@baselm wrote:

at friends list (in my server), i want the friends organized by their status, the online friends at the top and the offline friends under that online friends (if i had you and some1 called blablabla in my friends list and u were online and blablabla was offline, so at my friends list u will be at the top and he is under u , like this:
Friendslist
You- Logged in
Blablabla -Logged out.

Read full topic
